item.title: Max add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Max add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Be grateful, be smart, be clean, be true, be humble, be prayerful." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Max add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Life is to be enjoyed, not endured" -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Max add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Through all of living have much joy and laughter, life is to be enjoyed, not just endured." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Max add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "When an individual is motivated by great and powerful convictions of truth, then he disciplines himself, not because of the demands of the church, but because of the knowledge within his heart" -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Max add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "God is the designer of the family." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Max add a quote by Gordon B. Hinkley
item.description: "When an individual is motivated by great and powerful convictions of truth, then he disciplines himself, not because of the demands of the church, but because of the knowledge within his heart." -- Gordon B. Hinkley

item.title: Max add a quote by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
item.description: "Man is, that he may have Joy." -- The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

item.title: Max add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Max add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Max add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Every closed eye is not sleeping, and every open eye is not seeing." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Max add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Let us now set forth one of the fundamental truths about marriage: the wife is in charge." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Max add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Max add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Max add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Max add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Max add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer
